titles.title: Small Business Lending Fairness Act
A bill to amend the Truth in Lending Act to prohibit certain unfair credit practices, and for other purposes.
Small Business Lending Fairness Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

bill.summary:
Small Business Lending Fairness Act
This bill prohibits a creditor from accepting a borrower's waiver of the right to notice and opportunity to be heard in a legal proceeding regarding the debt.
